body.name: Ash Harbor Floating Wall Bookshelf - Wall Mounted Book Organizer with Included Bookmarks - Hardwood Hanging Bookshelf for Bedroom, Living Room, or Kitchen - A Thoughtful Gift for Book Lovers (Dark)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 5 mins
features: A BOOKSHELF THAT GROWS WITH YOU: Life is better spent reading a good book, but where do you store your growing collection? This expandable wall bookshelf allows you to add more rails to store and display your burgeoning library of books.

FORM MEETS FUNCTION: Make your floating bookshelves a statement piece! Instead of big, bulky bookshelves, keep your living space clean and contemporary with floating bookshelves for wall-mounted storage. Their unique design complements any decor.

STRONG, DURABLE HARDWOOD: When it comes to furniture, quality comes down to the details. For this wall-mounted bookshelf, we ensure that each one is made to the highest standards using natural rubberwood, a species with beautifully textured grain.

SPACE SAVING STORAGE: When space is at a premium, it's important to make use of every inch of room. That's why this bookshelf for wall storage makes so much sense: it keeps your books neatly organized without occupying valuable floor space.

BOOKMARKS BUILT IN: Unlike a traditional bookshelf, this wall-mount bookshelf helps keep your place as you read! Just use one of the 14 included pins to pick up right where you last stopped. That's what makes this a great gift for book lovers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bring Your Book Collection to Life with our Unique Wall-Mounted Floating Bookshelf! Make the most of your literary collection with the new and innovative Ash Harbor floating bookshelf. This stylish and decorative wall-mounted bookshelf adds an aesthetic touch to any bedroom or living space. It has a unique style that makes it perfect for organizing and displaying your favorite books. Showcase your book collection at the centerpiece of your space, and give it the perfect spot to call home on this floating bookshelf, a trendy room decor!

Expand Your Bookshelf as your Collection Grows! This wall-mounted hanging bookshelf features an infinitely expandable design, allowing you to add more space to your collection as it grows. The perfect combination of form and function, this trendy floating bookshelf is the perfect addition to level up your home.

Embrace Your Space With traditional bookshelves your room's decor gets overwhelmed by huge furniture dominating the space. Maximize your wall storage and create a contemporary look with these minimalist floating shelves. Install and Move with Ease Unlike big, bulky bookshelves these floating shelves can be installed easily by one person. If your moving to a new place or changing your interior design, they're a piece of cake to remove and reinstall! Showcase Your Passion Whether it's a captivating novel, transformative self-help book, or a must-have cookbook, you can show off all your latest reads! Start a fascinating book conversation with a shelf that your guests are sure to notice.

Quick and Easy to Install Transform your space in minutes with this stylish and practical floating bookshelf! It is easy to install and offers a minimalist and space-saving design. Enjoy the stylish look of your books aesthetically hanging and displaying on your wall with the practicality of storage space with this simple and decorative bookshelf. A statement piece for any room, this wall bookshelf is the perfect addition to your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Initially returned it from a marketing error
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. At first, I did, and requested a return due to me only getting those wooden pieces that you see at the top. Beware that the $28 one that stated that it was “unfinished,” did not come with the mounting bracket or wooden slab that you see. I assume that unfinished just means that it was unfinished Wood not that it was partial and just pieces. Once I realize that they actually gave us the option to do our own slacks and made this so much more satisfying. They give us a cheaper option or we can add to the ones that we already have. I LOVE THIS PRODUCT. Beautiful and unique. I bought the $28 pieces and went to dollar tree to get the slacks, left an inch from the wall for hanging and wrapped it in contact paper. So elegant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I'm so glad I decided to go with something a little creative for my book display, it came out great! I purchased 4 (so a total of 8 fourteen-inch segments), and I was glad to see that you don't need to connect them with the metal plate, you can do them individually as well. They were easy enough to install, although I did decide to use my own anchors since I was installing on a plaster wall.The one disappointment is that two of the strings broke out of their hangers as soon as I put light pressure on them (the holes were too wide for the knot). I tried tying a bigger knot to hold it in the hole, but then the string ended up much shorter than the others, and the book didn't hang level with the other books.But overall I'm very pleased and love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but expensive
reviews.reviewText: Don’t get me wrong, this is a nice decorative bookshelf for the wall. I don’t know that it’s worth the price though. It is made well but it is very lightweight, uses very little material, and only has the capacity to hold a dozen books.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: While I wish they came in different colors/finishes, I do like these. Each order comes with 2 "strips" and holds a total of 14 books. I ordered 2 so I have 28 books nicely organized and hanging above my bedside table. I have 3 floor to ceiling bookcases and no more room for another but there's just so many BOOKS out there. These are an immense help. I'd love them if I'd gotten a color that I liked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I thought I’d be impressed that it came in a nice cloth bag but the whole thing was knotted beyond use. After wasting an hour trying to unknot the strings I had the cut the string and I’m going to try and salvage the money I spent by buying string and reassembling it diy style🤦🏽‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t Wait to Get More!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this Hanging Shelf! It has such versatility when it comes to how you are able to display your favorite books or even just store them ac you can also just turn them spine out! I recently got into collecting manga and need a decent space to show them off but didn’t want a traditional bookshelf that would take up floor space. So I’m absolutely thrilled that I found these and for such an affordable price they come with just enough to get you started but I’ll tell you what if you are anything like me you will already be planning on buying another one..so just go ahead and buy 2!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars came with a broken hanger
reviews.reviewText: Was really looking forward to setting up my books after installing, but found out that one of the hangers was just loose. It broke off.Edit: I contacted customer support about this and they helped resolve the problem fully. Fast too. Would recommend and buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Be careful unboxing - beautiful and unique
reviews.reviewText: Our home has odd features to work around, so I'm always trying to find unique ways to save space and beautify it at the same time. This product brings new meaning to the word "floating." I've personally never seen anything like it. I like the way the strings can be used to hold your place as well. It is real wood and simple to assemble. I would just caution you to be very careful unboxing it. We got the strings tangled and it was a nightmare to unravel.
